org.jamsim.ascape

Class RootScape<D extends ScapeData>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Scape
      • org.jamsim.ascape.RootScape<D>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - a scape data class that defines data external to the scape for use by agents, and for loading agents.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JEMScape

    public class RootScape<D extends ScapeData>
extends Scape
    Root scape that initialises and loads agents into a base microsimulation scape.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    Oliver Mannion

        Parameters:
        name - This name appears in the navigator and Ascape title bar.
        numIterations - number of iterations per run
        numRuns - number of runs

      • loadR

        public ScapeRInterface loadR(boolean keepAllRunDFs)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Starts R on the base scape and creates a dataframe from the scape.

        Uses the lowercase version of the base scape name as the dataframe symbol. When evaluating rRunEndCommand and commands during the creation of output datasets in ROutput and ROutput1DMultiRun, this symbol is searched for and replaced with the current run's dataframe name.

        Parameters:
        keepAllRunDFs - flag to keep the dataframes from each run in R. This means creating each new dataframe with a unique name.
        Returns:
        scape R interface
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if problem starting R

      • loadRStartupFile

        public void loadRStartupFile()
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Run commands in the R startup file. Uses "R startup file" as the preferences key to lookup the location of the R startup file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if problem loading file

      • addScapeRListener

        public void addScapeRListener(java.lang.String rIterationEndCommand,
                     java.lang.String rSimBeginCommand,
                     java.lang.String rRunBeginCommand,
                     java.lang.String rRunEndCommand,
                     java.lang.String rSimEndCommand)
        Add scape R listener.
        Parameters:
        rIterationEndCommand - R command to run at the end of each iteration, or null .
        rSimBeginCommand - R command to run at the beginning of the simulation (ie: at the beginning of the first run only), or null.
        rRunBeginCommand - R command to run at the beginning of each run, or null .
        rRunEndCommand - R command to run at the end of each run, or null.
        rSimEndCommand - R command to run at the end of the simulation (ie: end of all runs), or null.

      • addBaseFileUpdateRCmd

        public void addBaseFileUpdateRCmd(java.lang.String cmd)
        Define the R command that is called by ScapeRInterface.baseFileUpdated() and call it.
        Parameters:
        cmd - base file update command, or null if none
